title: What can I do if I forget the screen unlock password or pattern?
answer:
You can solve this problem by reformatting your phone. Reformatting your phone erases all user data from your phone.

Reformatting using a microSD card:

1.         Download the software package corresponding to your phone model from http://consumer.huawei.com.

2.         Copy the **dload** folder in the software package to a microSD card's root directory.

3.         Power off your phone and insert the microSD card into your phone. Then, simultaneously press and hold the power, volume up, and volume down buttons to enter reformatting mode.

Your phone will be reformatted and restored to its factory settings.

If your phone can't be reformatted, contact Huawei technical support or take your phone to an authorized Huawei service center.
